tool_description:

name: stock-api
title: stock-api

api_list.name: Stock.GetLatestStock
Ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-api7.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
